text: Guy Laliberté, (born 2 September 1952) is a Canadian billionaire businessman, director, and poker player. He is the co-founder of Cirque du Soleil. In January 2018, Laliberté was ranked by Forbes as the 11th wealthiest Canadian. In September 2009, he became the first Canadian space tourist. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian billionaires Category:Canadian businesspeople Category:Poker players Category:People from Quebec City
title: Guy Laliberté
